articles.description: In case Rahul can't play in Dhaka Test, vice-captain Pujara could lead India, and Abhimanyu could be in line for a debut
articles.content: NewsIn case Rahul can't play in Dhaka Test, vice-captain Pujara could lead India, and Abhimanyu could be in line for a debut

articles.title: Kandy Falcons vs Jaffna Kings, Qualifier 1, Lanka Premier League 2022 - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Follow Kandy Falcons vs Jaffna Kings, Qualifier 1, Dec 21, Lanka Premier League 2022 with live Cricket score, ball by ball commentary updates on Cricbuzz
articles.content: 19:00 Local Time, 13:30 GMT, 19:00 IST: The game has been abandoned. Jaffna win on DLS and move to the final. They started the chase in a hurry taking 18 off Isuru Udana's first over and never looked… [+414 chars]
